title: Packers-49ers TNF Recap: Aaron Rodgers dismantles a beat up San Francisco squad (Football 11/6)
description:
Even though this game was over pretty early, that doesn't mean there aren't a ton of angles to discuss. Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson and John Breech to break down the Packers 34-17 victory over the 49ers on Thursday Night Football. It appeared to be a revenge game for Green Bay after getting dominated by San Fran last year, but that revenge was enacted vs a JV team. And despite the big win, it's still apparent that the Packers could use another wide receiver. Will Fuller could have been a great fit, but they were unable to get a deal done at the deadline. Are the 49ers completely out of contention? It'll be tough for them to re-enter the playoff conversation, but that could change if the league admits 8 teams in each conference to the postseason. And where does Aaron Rodgers sit at now in the MVP race? He's currently 3rd in odds at 5/1, but Brinson provides a better value bet down the board. Listen to the full TNF recap now!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @CodyJBenjamin, @E_DeBerardinis
